quizDescription.text:
In this recitation, we'll be using the dataset energy_bids.csv. Please download and save this dataset to your computer so that you can follow along. This data comes from the 2010 TREC Legal Track

An R script file with all of the commands we will be using in this recitation can be downloaded here. The R script file has been updated to using the most recent package functions, therefore some may be different from the functions in the videos.
